data.name: Inception
data.description:
Welcome to the brand new Inception app! Rebuilt from the ground up, the leading VR entertainment app is now faster, easier to use, and has even more content made just for you! 

Inception brings you the best in VR content. We use the revolutionary potential of immersive VR technology to empower you to escape reality and experience the impossible.

With new content added every week and partnerships with top publications like Refinery29 and FashionTV, there’s nothing you can’t do with Inception. We bring you the best content from creators around the world with Kaleidoscope. Travel to New York or London; step into artworks from masters Salvador Dalí and Monet; or experience music like you never have before with Mac DeMarco, DJs Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike!

If you’re looking for the best music, art, culture, and entertainment in virtual reality, you’ve come to the right place. Download Inception now and let us change your world.

Have feedback? Need help? Email us: admin@inceptionvr.com
